title: Productizing with Offers

summary.description: Jay and I have somewhat similar careers. We ended up in similar but different places and this is a phenomenal episode for those of us that sometimes feel we are insisting on something that is not working.
summary.guest: Jay Melone helps Experts turn their Expertise into Offers. He's also a friend. We go to talking roughly an year ago. I had signed up for his newsletter, sent him a note and next thing you know we're trading music suggestions and sharing lessons learned.

topics: What's the difference between productizing services and creating actual products?
How do you structure offers that clients can easily understand and buy?
What are the key elements of a successful productized consulting offer?
